data.title: List of American films of 1973
data.meta_description: A list of American films released in 1973. The Sting won the Academy Award for Best Picture. The highest-grossing film of the year was The Exorcist. The Exorcist The Sting American Graffiti Papillon The Way We Were Magnum Force Robin Hood Live and Let Die Walking Tall Serpico
